field_body.value:
The Milken Institute Future of Health Summit convenes the best minds in the world to confront the most significant health challenges by matching human, financial, scientific, and educational resources with innovative and impactful ideas.

The Summit will focus on the converging crises of public health, economic insecurity, and social injustice. COVID-19 has exposed weaknesses across our health systems, particularly in the treatment of our most vulnerable communities, where access to affordable and quality health care has never been more vital.

Now, more than ever, we must not only find solutions to the immediate challenges of this crisis but continue important conversations to address ongoing needs. The events of the recent past will be transformative, but they have also uniquely positioned the Milken Institute—and its broad network—to meet this moment, work together, and rebuild meaningful lives for all.

#MIHealthSummit
